entry.title: Vitalik Buterin Baffles Crypto Twitter: Can You Solve His Math Puzzle?
entry.summary:
Vitalik Buterin, the enigmatic co-founder of Ethereum, sent shockwaves through the crypto Twittersphere this past weekend with a series of seemingly nonsensical equations. The equations, which defied basic arithmetic (think 2 + 2 = 0), left many scratching their heads and fearing a break in the very fabric of mathematics.
However, as it turns out, Buterin wasn‚Äôt having a mathematical meltdown; he was introducing a revolutionary new concept called Binius.
Vitalik Buterin Unveils Binius: A Game Changer For Cryptographic Proofs?
The absurd equations were a clever (and admittedly confusing) way for Buterin to introduce Binius, a system designed to significantly improve the efficiency of zero-knowledge (ZK) proofs. ZK proofs are a powerful cryptographic tool that allows one to prove the‚Ä¶

entry.title: XRP Lawsuit: SEC Counters Ripple‚Äôs Motion To Strike ‚Äì A Detailed Analysis
entry.summary:
In the XRP lawsuit, the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has countered Ripple Labs‚Äôs recent motion to strike the declaration of SEC summary witness Andrea Fox. The agency‚Äôs filing asserts that the testimony is permissible as summary evidence under federal law, not requiring expert disclosure as claimed by Ripple.
The SEC‚Äôs motion, directed to Judge Sarah Netburn, underscores that the Fox Declaration is a ‚Äústandard summary evidence permissible under Fed. R. Evid. 1006,‚Äù which aims to aid the court by providing straightforward arithmetic calculations based on Ripple‚Äôs financial records. The SEC‚Äôs motion states that ‚ÄúIt is not an expert‚Äôs report, does not rely on specialized expertise, and does not render any opinions at all, let alone an ‚Äòexpert‚Äô one.‚Äù
Ripple had argued that the ‚Ä¶

entry.title: First In History: Bitcoin Miners Now Need More Than 1 EH/s Of Power To Mine 1 BTC
entry.summary:
On-chain data shows that, for the first time in history, Bitcoin miners require more than 1 EH/s of daily computing power to mine just 1 token of the asset.
Bitcoin Hashcoin Has Set A New All-Time High Now
As explained by CryptoQuant head of research Julio Moreno in a post on X, the BTC Hashcoin has set a new record. The ‚ÄúHashcoin‚Äù here refers to an indicator that keeps track of the daily Hashrate miners require to produce 1 BTC.
The Hashrate measures the computing power that the miners have attached to the Bitcoin network. This metric is measured in terms of hashes per second, or, in the much bigger and more practical unit these days, exahashes per second (EH/s).
The total Hashrate on the blockchain has been near its all-time high (ATH) recently, as its 7-day average value is si‚Ä¶

entry.title: Bitcoin Whales, Not Retailers, Are Safe If The United States Government Begins Confiscating Coins: Analyst
entry.summary:
Willy Woo, an on-chain analyst, took to X on April 29,¬†raising¬†concerns about the fate of retail Bitcoin investors if the world, especially the United States, plunges into a recession.
Woo, referencing historical events, argues that while large Bitcoin holders, or ‚Äúwhales,‚Äù are likely to weather the storm since they control private keys of their coins, retailers or everyday BTC investors might face a different reality.
Who Will Be Safe If The United States Government Began Confiscating Bitcoin?
The analyst compares the current market and the economic downturn of the Great Depression of 1930. During that time, the United States government, Woo warned, seized gold from the public to replenish national reserves.¬†
Woo now raises the question of whether a similar scenario could unfol‚Ä¶

entry.title: Ethereum Regulatory Saga: Court Filings Expose SEC Chair Gensler‚Äôs Stand
entry.summary:
Newly disclosed court filings have shed light on the belief of the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and its chairman, Gary Gensler, that Ethereum (ETH) is an ‚Äúunregistered security‚Äù under the Howey Test, which is considered by the vast majority of crypto advocates to be an outdated legal framework for regulating crypto assets.¬†¬†
According to a recent Fox Business report, the details emerged following Ethereum software company ConsenSys‚Äôs filing of an unredacted complaint against the SEC.
Is Ethereum An ‚ÄòUnregistered Security‚Äô?
According to the court filings, SEC Chair Gensler and the agency seem to have held the belief for at least a year that Ethereum was operating as an unregistered security, thereby violating federal regulations.¬†
The SEC‚Äôs Division of Enforcement, l‚Ä¶

entry.title: Wormhole Wednesday
entry.summary: BTC hits $64.5K then rebounds, SOL outperforms. Government sends $2B BTC to Coinbase to sell. Funding rates stay low after sweep lower. ETFs see small inflow, Ark outflow more than GBTC. Wormhole W launches at $15B FDV. BTC ‚Äòinflection point‚Äô if it follows rates or gold. Gold & BTC very correlated for the last year. Expect slower ETF volume this month: Bloomberg. BTC 2x and 3x levered ETFs launch yesterday. BTC ETFs now half the size of gold.

entry.title: First Dogs, Now Cats
entry.summary: BTC falls another 6% amid $400m liquidations. ETF outflows and dollar strength blamed for move. Funding completely reset to lows in move. BTC lower high leaves market in ‚Äòno trade zone‚Äô. This cycle acting ‚Äònothing like previous cycle‚Äô. ETH unlikely to be classed a security: Coinbase CFO. Crypto VC funding up 53% in MarchAnsem‚Äôs cat coin sees more volume than NFT market. Most memecoins down 10-20% given move in majors. MEW up 10% after HTX lists, airdrop to Saga phones. MEME to launch memecoin chain, NFTs rise. Pixelmon releases trailer for Anime series.
